review: The item works well. I would like better instructions. There are other features I would like to use but I have not figured out all the details as I'm not quite as tech savvy as I would like to be. I'm using the fire stick in conjunction with my Directv which gives me even more options thanks to Netflix. I'm also watching You Tube on the TV through the fire stick which I enjoy much more on my 65" big screen. I understand It is possible to view my photos and videos through my  iphone but I have not figured this out yet.
